author: Ross Burden
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Stuff the 10 prunes with the 10 pieces of chocolate. Place onto a baking sheet and place into the oven to bake for six minutes, until warmed through. Remove from the oven and serve on a warm plate.
ingredients: 10 dried prunes, stones removed and incisions made lengthways,  50g/1Â¾oz dark chocolate, cut into 10 equal pieces
